slides.title: Edgeryders Listening Triades Form
slides.subtitle: Welcome to Edgeryders!
slides.body:
Welcome! In this group exercise you will need to play three roles: take notes, ask questions and answer questions for three minutes each. This form is where each person adds their own notes from the exercise.

If you already have an edgeryders.eu account:
  1. Log in here.
  2. Go here.
  3. Hit the "+ New topic" button and answer the questions.
If you do not already have an account, then the rest of this form is for you!

slides.title: Question 1/3: Who's talking?
slides.body: Ask the person who is speaking right now if what their name is and if they already have an edgeryders account? Add their answer here.

slides.title: Question 2/3: Notes.
slides.body: What is the person who is speaking saying? Please try to write every word – sometimes a single word can unlock a lot of thoughts!

slides.title: Question 3/3: Reflection.
slides.body: Take a minute to think about what has been said. What are your own thoughts about it – anything that you find especially interesting? Perhaps there is something you would like to explore more during the rest of the workshop?

slides.title: The last little bit!
slides.body: These questions will help everyone to find the documentation and continue the discussion after the event.

slides.title: Well done!
slides.body:
Well done! Thank you for taking part in the listening triade.

* We have created a new edgeryders.eu account for you, and published your listening triade notes using that account. You will receive an e-mail about the account we created for you. You can use that to log in to edgeryders.eu and edit your listening triade notes. No password is required to login – just click "With Email" in the login form to receive a one-time login link.
